module-assistant.intro-text: 以斯拉圣经程序使用你的网络安装{{module_type, accusative}}. {{module_type, capitalize}} are distributed by the CrossWire Bible Society and will be downloaded from the SWORD project repositories.
module-assistant.internet-usage-note:
重要提示
如果你在个基督徒迫害的国家,
请注意你的互联网服务提供商会检测你在访问基督教的资源!

update-data.repo-data-last-updated: 上次更新了存储库的日期是{{date}}.
update-data.updating-repository-data: 更新存储库数据! 请等待几秒钟...
update-data.update-repository-data-failed: 更新存储库数据失败了! 您有网络吗？

step-languages.select-language: 请至少选一个在下面的语言.
step-languages.total-modules-language: 每个语言旁边的数字是有多少的{{module_type}}在SWORD存储库.

step-repositories.total-modules-repo: Next to each repository is the number of {{module_type}} available from the repository.
step-repositories.what-is-repository: A repository is an internet storage location that contains a set of {{module_type}}.
step-repositories.more-repo-information-needed: If you need more information about these repositories, have a look at the CrossWire Wiki.

step-modules.show-detailed-module-info: Click on the information icon to see more details about the {{module_type, singular}}.

step-install.it-takes-time-to-install: Note that it takes some time for each {{module_type, singular}} to be downloaded and then installed.

remove.select-module-to-be-removed: Select the {{module_type, accusative}} that you would like to remove.
remove.disable-remove-note: This {{module_type, singular}} is not installed in the user's directory or is essential for Ezra Bible App's functionality.

unlock.module-lock-info: {{module_type, singular}}是许可证保护的，需要买解锁密钥
unlock.enter-unlock-key: {{moduleId, singular}}是许可证保护的. 请出入密钥!
unlock.unlock-failed: 解锁失败了! 请输入正确的密钥.

general.general-app-info:
General information about Ezra Bible App can be found on the website.
Technical information about the development of Ezra Bible App can be found on GitHub.
general.new-release-available-body: A new release of Ezra Bible App is available!
general.detect-locale-hint: 照着系统语言自动选区域
general.module-copyright-disclaimer: By proceeding with exporting you hereby agree to this translation's copyright policy and any restrictions regarding quotations from the {{module_name}}.
general.export-user-data-hint: This function exports all user data (tags, notes) along with their verse references to a CSV file.
general.module-updates-available: There are updates available for the modules listed below.
general.modules-up-to-date: All installed modules are up to date!
general.title: 标题

data-privacy.please-confirm-options: Please confirm the following data privacy options. These options require internet access. You can also make changes in the Options menu later.
data-privacy.check-new-releases-hint: Ezra Bible App can check for new releases at every start. This requires a short interaction with GitHub, where new releases are published.
data-privacy.send-crash-reports-hint-part1: Ezra Bible App can automatically send error reports to the error tracking platform Sentry.io whenever an error is detected.
data-privacy.send-crash-reports-hint-part2: This helps the development team to become aware of issues much faster and therefore contributes to the enhancement of Ezra Bible App.
data-privacy.send-crash-reports-hint-part3: Note that the error reports only contain technical information and do not require much data bandwidth.

help.help-text-no-tags-book-opened:
To start working with tags, create your first tag by clicking on the button New tag.

After that you can browse the Bible text, click or drag-select verses and then assign the tag you just created.
help.help-text-no-tags-no-book-opened: To start working with tags, first select a Bible book to study.
help.help-text-translation-available: To start, select a book or a tag from the menu above.
help.help-text-no-translations:
To start, first install at least one Bible translation.

You can open the installation assistent by clicking on the settings icon and then Configure translations.

shortcuts.description: 您可以使用在下面的快捷建:

tags.tag-info-would-be-deleted: 所有关联的经文的标签信息会被删除！
tags.tag-specific-notes-would-be-deleted: The tag specific notes would be deleted!
tags.really-remove-tag-assignment: Do you really want to remove the tag "" from the selected verses?
tags.export-tagged-verse-list: Export tagged verse list to Word document
tags.assign-tag-hint: Select a verse to assign the tag
tags.add-existing-tags-to-current-tag-group: Add existing tags to current tag group
tags.delete-tag-from-group-explanation: The tag {{tag}} will be deleted from the group {{group}}. To permanently delete the tag, click the checkbox below.
tags.really-delete-tag-group:
Do you really want to delete the tag group
{{tagGroupTitle}}?

bible-browser.no-search-results: No results found when searching for
bible-browser.module-search-cancelled: Module search cancelled when searching for
bible-browser.load-verse-context: Load the context of this verse
bible-browser.tag-hint: Click to show all verses with this tag
bible-browser.search-performance-hint: Only showing book list due to high number of search results. You can request the individual search results per book.
bible-browser.open-verse-lists-in-new-tab: Open verse lists in new tab
bible-browser.strongs-number-not-valid: This is not a valid Strong's number!
bible-browser.open-verselist-in-new-tab: Open verse list in new tab

transchange.amplified: These words are amplifications of information in the source text
transchange.changed: 在这译文这些字被改了
transchange.deleted: Some words in the source text are not present in the translation
transchange.implied: These words were added or changed to translate information implied by the source text
transchange.moved: These words were in another location in the source text
transchange.tense-change: The grammatical tense of these words was changed in order to facilitate translation

word-study-panel.help-instruction-intro: How to show dictionary entries here:
word-study-panel.help-instruction-part1: Make sure that Strong's Dictionaries (Hebrew and Greek) are installed. Status: {{ install_status }}.
word-study-panel.help-instruction-part2: Open a translation with the Strong's feature.
word-study-panel.help-instruction-part3: Once you have selected a verse you can move your mouse over the individual words and phrases to see dictionary entries here.
word-study-panel.help-instruction-part3-cordova: Touch and hold individual words or phrases until you see dictionary entries here.
word-study-panel.help-instruction-part4-desktop: Hold the SHIFT key to enable the mouseover function for all verses.

tag-statistics-panel.help-instruction-part1: Here you will see statistics of tags based on how frequently they are used in a book.
tag-statistics-panel.help-instruction-part2: There are currently no tag assignments in this book.
tag-statistics-panel.help-instruction-part2-tag-group: There are currently no tag assignments in this book based on the current tag group.
tag-statistics-panel.help-instruction-part3: Once you start assigning tags, the tag statistics will refresh automatically.

compare-panel.help-instruction:
To compare translations, you select one verse or a group of verses.

This area will then automatically list the selected verses from all available translations.

You need to have at least two translations installed for this functionality to work.

commentary-panel.help-instruction:
To show commentary content, select a verse.

This area will then automatically list the selected verse from all available commentaries.
commentary-panel.help-instruction-no-commentaries: No commentaries have been installed, yet. You need to install at least one commentary for this functionality to work.
commentary-panel.help-instruction-no-kjv:
The KJV translation has not been installed, yet. The KJV is needed to correctly show Bible commentaries based on English versification. You can fix this by:
  • Installing the KJV from the CrossWire repository
  • Installing a commentary (the KJV gets automatically installed in this case)
commentary-panel.no-commentaries-available-for-this-verse: There are no commentaries available for this verse.

cordova.storage-justification:
Ezra Bible App needs access to the device storage area to save SWORD modules and store its database.

After pressing the button below, you will be asked to allow Ezra Bible App to access files on your device.
cordova.storage-permission-denied:
You decided to deny storage access.
You can change this by pressing the button below!
cordova.permanent-permission-decision-part1:
Previously, you decided to permanently deny storage access!

You can only revert that decision in the permission settings in the Android system configuration.
cordova.permanent-permission-decision-part2:
If you do not change the permission settings,
Ezra Bible App will not start up successfully.

dropbox.dropbox-sync-explanation-part1: The Dropbox synchronization can be used to synchronize your Ezra Bible App database across multiple devices.
dropbox.dropbox-sync-explanation-part2: The database will be synchronized in the following events:
dropbox.dropbox-sync-explanation-part3a: After linking the Dropbox account for the first time.
dropbox.dropbox-sync-explanation-part3b: At application start or when resumed.
dropbox.dropbox-sync-explanation-part3e: After turning on WiFi (only Android, based on option).
dropbox.dropbox-sync-explanation-part4: To start using the Dropbox sync you need to first link your Dropbox account with Ezra Bible App.
dropbox.sync-failed-msg: Failed to synchronize database with Dropbox ({{date}}: {{syncResult}}).
dropbox.access-method-message-part1:
The Dropbox access method has changed!

Previously a custom folder was used for Dropbox access.
dropbox.access-method-message-part2: From Ezra Bible App 1.15, app folder access is used.
dropbox.access-method-message-part3: The new Dropbox folder is /Apps/Ezra Bible App.
dropbox.access-method-message-part4: The link of Ezra Bible App to your Dropbox account has been reset.
dropbox.access-method-message-part5: These are the actions you need to take now:
dropbox.access-method-message-part7: Upgrade Ezra Bible App on all your devices to ensure that the Dropbox sync method is the same.
